tool_description:
Download subtitles of YouTube videos in plain text. 
Last updated: 02 January 2024. 
Update: Now it supports SRT format subtitles. (separate endpoint added).
Update: Now this API supports auto-generated subtitles as well as supports multiple languages (if available). Just pass the lang parameter like: en, de, fr, etc, Default lang = en.
name: YouTube Subtitles & Captions Downloader
title: YouTube Subtitles & Captions Downloader

api_list.name: Get Subtitles- SRT
api_list.description:
Give the link of any YouTube video which has captions. It will return the subtitles in SRT format.

UPDATES: Now you get auto-generated titles and subtitles other than default English (en) language. (If available).

api_list.name: Get Subtitles- Plain Text
api_list.description:
Give the link of any YouTube video which has captions. It will return the subtitles in plain text- no formatting.

UPDATES: Now you get auto-generated titles and subtitles other than default English (en) language. (If available).
